medium: Pen and brown and pink ink and graphite
title: Craps Game
description: two elves with very large heads playing dice, seated under a mushroom; three other elves look on--one with antenna stands, leaning against mushroom stem, small seated elf wearing cap with pompon in LRC; another elf at left wearing glasses peeks out from grasses; caterpillar, LRC; unfinished
creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
